findings.title: Flashloan Attack
findings.description: When working with exchange rates, they should be received from a trusted source and not be vulnerable to short-term rate changes that can be achieved by using flash loans. Oracles should be used.

findings.title: Token Supply Manipulation
findings.description: Tokens can be minted only according to rules specified in a whitepaper or any other documentation provided by the Customer.

findings.title: Style Guide Violation
findings.description: The provided projects should follow the official guidelines. Following the Solidity Style guidelines facilitates code comprehension, increases readability and makes supporting code easier.

findings.title: Requirements Compliance
findings.description: The audit report includes a scope section outlining the reviewed contracts and their respective SHA3 hashes.

findings.title: CEI Pattern Violation
findings.description: The Checks-Effects-Interactions pattern is violated during the transferFrom performance, tokens are transferred to the recipient before spending the allowance.

findings.title: Redundant Import
findings.description: Proxy and Address imports are redundant because they are never used. Redundant declarations cause consuming extra Gas.
